DOC.brief_summary: The is study will examine whether variation in clinical bleeding frequency and severity among boys with severe Hemophilia A (Factor VIII deficiency) is associated with variations in laboratory measurements of platelet activity.
DOC.brief_title: Phenotypic Heterogeneity in Hemophilia A: An Investigation of the Role of Platelet Function
